scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,ui -c blue,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.build: npm --workspace apps/api run build && npm --workspace apps/ui run build
scripts.test: npm --workspace apps/api run test:unit && npm --workspace apps/ui run test
scripts.lint: npm --workspace apps/api run lint && npm --workspace apps/ui run lint
scripts.typecheck: npm --workspace apps/api run typecheck && npm --workspace apps/ui run typecheck
scripts.fmt: npm --workspace apps/api run format && npm --workspace apps/ui run format
scripts.fmt:check: npm --workspace apps/api run format:check && npm --workspace apps/ui run format:check
scripts.verify: npm --workspace apps/api run verify && npm --workspace apps/ui run verify
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:ui
